| Plot = | Cast = * {{WP|Don Cheadle}} as [[James Rhodes (Earth-199999)|War Machine / James Rhodes]] | Notes = | Trivia = * It was originally announced as a Disney+ miniseries consisting of six episodes, but was redeveloped as a feature film in September 2022, with Yassir Lester writing the screenplay.{{cite web|url=https://www.hollywoodreporter.com/movies/movie-news/marvels-iron-wars-to-be-movie-don-cheadle-1235230012/|title=Marvel Shakes Up ‘Armor Wars’: Don Cheadle Series Now Being Developed as a Movie (Exclusive)|work=The Hollywood Reporter|last=Kit|first=Borys|date=September 29, 2022|accessdate=July 5, 2023}} | Links = * [[Marvel Films#Upcoming Films|Marvel Films]] }}
